definition: Xue Rengui (614-683) great Tang dynasty general
surname Xue/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)

sentences.english: The emperor expressed appreciation to Xue for helping him survive the disaster and awarded Xue with a royal horse.
sentences.chinese: 躲過大難，唐高宗感激薛仁貴，特賜薛仁貴御馬一匹。

sentences.english: The emperor expressed appreciation to Xue for helping him survive the disaster and awarded Xue with a royal horse.
